title: Charles Young Buffalo Soldiers National Monument: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility          At this time, Charles Young Buffalo Soldiers National Monument is being developed for visitor use. It is not yet open to the visiting public for regular visitation hours, but interpretive programs and exhibits are under development.  While there are no regular visitation hours, you can check the park's Guided Tours page for information on when the next public open house dates will be.  You can also schedule an appointment to visit the park building, Youngsholm, by calling us at the park.  For general park information, please visit the FAQ page.  Park facilities are currently being upgraded for accessibility, so please be aware of this when you are able to visit.   For up-to-date information on the planning of the park, information on tours and volunteer opportunities, or to schedule an appointment for a tour, please contact us by email or call 937-503-5614 .
